definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Chemical form of hafnium is perchlorate or nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 鉿的化學形態爲過氯酸鹽或硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: I demand a full refund for this purchase.
sentences.chinese: 我要求呃剮交易全鉿退款。

sentences.english: Why can you always have vexed thing hafnium?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼總是會有煩惱的事鉿？

sentences.english: The hafnium crystal bar was produced by the iodide decomposition method from wast material of processing.
sentences.chinese: 用碘化物熱分解法由鉿加工殘料生產鉿晶棒。

sentences.english: The hafnium crystal bar was produced by the iodide decomposition method from wast material of processing.
sentences.chinese: 用碘化物熱分解法由鉿加工殘料生產鉿晶棒。

definition: milliwatt (old)/single-character equivalent of 毫瓦[hao2 wa3]
